screeners.name: DIBELS
screeners.description: Dynamic Indicators of Basic Early Literacy Skills

interventions.name: Sound Boxes (Elkonin Boxes)
interventions.description: Students use boxes to represent individual sounds in words, moving tokens into boxes as they segment sounds.
interventions.resources: Elkonin box templates, tokens or counters

interventions.name: Phoneme Counting Activities
interventions.description: Practice identifying and counting the number of phonemes in spoken words using various manipulatives.
interventions.resources: Counters, picture cards

interventions.name: Blending Chains
interventions.description: Teacher says individual phonemes and students blend them together to form words. Progress from simple to complex words.
interventions.resources: Word lists, picture cards for support

interventions.name: Robot Talk
interventions.description: Students practice blending sounds together by pretending to be robots who speak in separate sounds.
interventions.resources: Picture cards, word lists

interventions.name: Letter-Keyword-Sound Association
interventions.description: Systematic instruction connecting letters with key words and their sounds using multisensory approaches.
interventions.resources: Letter cards, keyword picture cards, sound charts

interventions.name: Sky Writing
interventions.description: Students trace large letters in the air while saying the letter name and sound, reinforcing motor memory.
interventions.resources: Letter cards for reference

interventions.name: Word Building with Letter Cards
interventions.description: Students manipulate letter cards to build and decode words, focusing on CVC patterns initially.
interventions.resources: Letter cards or magnetic letters, word lists

interventions.name: Decodable Text Practice
interventions.description: Guided reading practice with texts that follow learned phonics patterns.
interventions.resources: Decodable readers, running record forms

interventions.name: Repeated Reading
interventions.description: Students read the same passage multiple times to build automaticity and fluency.
interventions.resources: Leveled passages, timer, fluency charts

interventions.name: Partner Reading
interventions.description: Students take turns reading aloud with a partner, providing support and feedback to each other.
interventions.resources: Paired reading protocols, appropriate-level texts

interventions.name: Vocabulary Mapping
interventions.description: Students create visual maps of words including definitions, synonyms, examples, and illustrations.
interventions.resources: Vocabulary maps templates, target word lists

interventions.name: Word Study Activities
interventions.description: Explicit instruction in word meanings through context, word parts, and semantic relationships.
interventions.resources: Word cards, context passages, morphology charts

tiers.name: Tier 2 - Targeted/Supplemental Intervention
tiers.description: Additional support for students at risk

screeners.name: DIBELS
screeners.description: Dynamic Indicators of Basic Early Literacy Skills

interventions.name: Intensive Phonics Instruction
interventions.description: Systematic and explicit phonics instruction with increased practice opportunities and immediate corrective feedback.
interventions.resources: Structured phonics program materials, word lists, decodable texts

interventions.name: Word Study Intervention
interventions.description: Focused instruction on word patterns, syllable types, and morphology with extensive practice.
interventions.resources: Word sort cards, syllable division guides, morphology charts

interventions.name: Guided Repeated Reading with Progress Monitoring
interventions.description: Structured repeated reading sessions with graphing of progress and specific fluency goals.
interventions.resources: Leveled passages, timers, progress monitoring graphs

interventions.name: Phrase-Cued Text Reading
interventions.description: Reading practice with texts marked in meaningful phrases to improve phrasing and prosody.
interventions.resources: Phrase-cued texts, audio models (optional)

interventions.name: Intensive Vocabulary Instruction
interventions.description: Explicit teaching of tier 2 academic vocabulary with multiple exposures and practice in various contexts.
interventions.resources: Academic vocabulary lists, word cards, context sentences

interventions.name: Strategic Reading Instruction
interventions.description: Explicit instruction in comprehension strategies including predicting, questioning, clarifying, and summarizing.
interventions.resources: Strategy posters, graphic organizers, leveled texts

interventions.name: Guided Reading with Comprehension Focus
interventions.description: Small group guided reading with explicit attention to comprehension strategies and discussion.
interventions.resources: Leveled books, comprehension question stems, discussion guides

tiers.name: Tier 3 - Intensive/Individual Intervention
tiers.description: Intensive, individualized support for students with significant needs

screeners.name: DIBELS
screeners.description: Dynamic Indicators of Basic Early Literacy Skills

interventions.name: Intensive Phonemic Awareness Training
interventions.description: One-on-one or very small group intensive practice with phoneme manipulation tasks using multisensory techniques.
interventions.resources: Elkonin boxes, sound cards, manipulatives, specialized PA program

interventions.name: Structured Literacy Approach
interventions.description: Intensive, systematic, explicit instruction following a structured literacy approach (e.g., Orton-Gillingham based).
interventions.resources: Structured literacy program materials, multisensory materials, progress monitoring tools

interventions.name: Intensive Fluency Building Program
interventions.description: One-on-one intensive repeated reading with immediate corrective feedback and frequent progress monitoring.
interventions.resources: Controlled text passages, recording tools, detailed progress charts

interventions.name: Individualized Comprehension Intervention
interventions.description: One-on-one explicit strategy instruction with scaffolded practice and gradual release tailored to student needs.
interventions.resources: Individualized reading materials, strategy cards, graphic organizers, assessment tools
